name: Requiem Kitsune
description:
[Important]

Okay, so turns out there's a possible error that can happen after the 2nd to last final boss, where you will end up getting a game over regardless if you win or lose. If this happens, start a new game, go to the bottom left corner of the introduction room, and go to the teleport room. There you will interact with the armored version of Kit and you will teleport to the next area.

WARNING: This game contains mature themes such as abuse, hard drug use, gore and excessive foul language.

Requiem Kitsune is a short story about a teenage girl, Autumn "Kit" Intentions,  her girlfriend, Katie "Kat" House, and their other friends who had just moved to the fictional Japanese city Metaruseben, hoping to live a normal life... until they're thrown into another dimension inside of a laptop!
